#summary How to get JGF.
#labels Featured

= Downloading JGF =

Currently JGF is still in an early stage of development.

The source code can be accessed at:

[http://code.google.com/p/jgf/source/checkout http://code.google.com/p/jgf/source/checkout]

= Dependencies =

In order to use JGF, you will need to add libraries or a project dependency to [http://www.jmonkeyengine.com JMonkeyEngine] (the underlying game engine). 

Other dependencies are included in the src/main/lib directory. Those need to be added to your Java classpath.
